item.title: Join us at OpenSauce
item.description: The Bayme.sh team will be at OpenSauce, come check it out. Did you know this will be the first offical showing of Meshtastic at a conference/event?

item.title: New website launch
item.description: We’ve got a new website, tell us what you think. Suggest some changes
